item.title: CVE-2022-21746|2024-08-03T02:53:35.697Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6771%2C%20mt6779%2C%20mt6781%2C%20mt6785%2C%20mt6833%2C%20mt6853%2C%20mt6873%2C%20mt6885%2C%20mt6893%2C%20mt8167%2C%20mt8167s%2C%20mt8168%2C%20mt8175%2C%20mt8362a%2C%20mt8365%2C%20mt8788
item.description: In imgsensor, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local denial of service with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS06479698; Issue ID: ALPS06479698.
